properties.address: Graham Adams Centre, Southam, Warwickshire CV47 0LY
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th December 2023** A warm, welcoming, safe space where you can chat, play board games, do puzzles, read, knit and more.... We will be providing self service hot drinks, and soup and a roll for lunch. **Open on Mondays from 4 December from 10 am - 2pm. Marlow Library, Institute Road, Marlow SL7 1BL will be open as a warm, welcoming space from Tuesday to Saturday.
properties.title: After School Space

properties.address: Castle Quay Shop Shoppin Centre Banbury, Banbury, Oxfordshire ox16 5un
properties.description: A community space in the Banbury Castle Quay Shopping Centre where residents can go. Maybe just to sit, warm up, read information from local support services or meet with friends and charge a phone!
properties.title: Community Hub

properties.description: We currently hold a regular 'Food Chest' every Wednesday morning which enables us to provide food "Too good to Waste" on a weekly basis from Waitrose and Tesco's. A suggested donation of £2.00 for 10 items and this enables the community to choose from the weekly offering. A library space has been created within the church, which offers individuals to buy or borrow books, magazines, periodicals, etc for a small donation. The church also holds a regular Tea Room in the church, which provides, hot drinks, soups, hot and cold food, cakes, etc. along with local villagers offering fresh vegetables, eggs, and preserves at a preferential cost. In addition, we have a small gift stall where small items can be bought at a reduced priced along with a flower and plant stall. We are hoping to expand both of these two events in the church, however due to its size and going into the Winter Months, it is an extensive building to heat in its entirety, therefore we are looking for funding to segregate an area to provide a warmer space, along with facility to make crafts and engage in activities. There is also support from the two lead people to help anyone who requires assistance on paperwork, internet, etc.
properties.title: Hub at the Church

properties.description: The space is open for drinks Thursday morning 9 - 12noon. Easy Access and open to all
properties.title: Marlborough Road Methodist Church Banbury

properties.description: Welcoming space. Free refreshments. Newspapers & Magazines. Crafting Circle - bring your own knitting, crotcheting, needlework etc. Children's Craft Table during School Holiday times.

properties.address: Southam Library and Information Centre, Southam, Warwickshire CV47 0HB
properties.description: Warwickshire Libraries, offer a comfortable safe environment for everyone to use and our free services will help to keep some of your costs down. You don’t need to be a library member to visit – just pop in. Choose to spend time reading, studying, working and using free library WiFi; tackle a jigsaw, play a board game, become absorbed in mindfulness colouring or join in our free library events and activities for all ages to make friends or learn something new.
properties.title: Southam Library and Information Centre

properties.address: The Royal British Legion Care Home, Southam, Warwickshire CV47 2BL
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 20th August 2024** Our Men's Shed is a warm and welcoming space where the local community are encouraged to come together and take part in crafting and creating their own projects (Ladies are welcome too). Men’s Sheds encourage people to come together to make, repair and repurpose, supporting projects in their local communities. Improving wellbeing, reducing loneliness and combatting social isolation.
properties.title: Southam Men's Shed at Galanos

properties.address: Southam Congregational Church, Wood St, Southam CV47 1PP
properties.description: The Southam Warm Space offers friendship, support and advice to everyone looking for a place to meet in Southam. Held every Wednesday from 11am to 4pm we offer hot drinks, food, free wi-fi, newspapers and much more. There is no charge to attend and we have people stay for 15 minutes and we have people stay for 3 hours. Come and join us. There’s always a warm welcome.
properties.title: Southam Warm Space

properties.address: Southam Youth Club, Graham Adams Centre, Southam, CV47 0LY
properties.description:
Run by our youth worker and volunteers, we offer a FREE family drop in after school. Come and take part in activities, use our wifi and get the information/advice you need. Free refreshments are available.

We will have toys and crafts for the children to play with and access to our multi-play table (air hockey, pool, table tennis) and table football. Parents will be provided with information and advice and children can be helped with their homework.
properties.title: Graham Adams Centre, Southam Family Space
